review_data.title: Great food! Great value.
review_data.content: This restaurant was close to the station and hotels. It was very good food, friendly efficient service and good value. The dumplings are made on the premises and are delicious. Recommend highly.

review_data.title: Excellent Japanese food, perfect lunch spot
review_data.content: I have eaten at Maki Haus several times and find the quality and consistency of the food and service excellent. The menu offers a nice variety - I am partial to the Bento box lunch menu and highly recommend the Mochi Ice dessert!
